title: Egypt Starts ‘Medical Intervention’ on Prominent Political Prisoner, Family Says
description: The hunger-striking dissident Alaa Abd El Fattah escalated his protest this week when he stopped drinking water as a U.N. climate conference opened in Egypt. His family fears that he is being force fed.
dc:creator: Vivian Yee
media:description: Alaa Abd El Fattah in 2015 in Cairo’s Tora prison.
